title: Invalid JSON string
cause: Invalid ${featureContainerResource} JSON string

title: Invalid JSON string
cause: Invalid connector JSON string

title: IDs don't match
cause: The ${featureContainerResource} ID in the body does not match the resource ID in the path.

title: Invalid ${featureContainerResource} context.
cause: Invalid ${featureContainerResource} context.

title: Invalid value for versionRef
cause: Invalid value for versionRef: ${versionRef}. ${cause}

title: Missing required parameter
cause: Query parameter ${param} is required.

title: Missing feature ID(s)
cause: At least one feature ID should be provided as a query parameter.

title: Invalid ${resource} configuration provided
cause: ${cause}

title: ${featureContainerResource} modification is not allowed
cause: It's not permitted to perform modifications through context ${context}.

title: Resource not found
cause: The requested resource does not exist.
action: Please check if the path is correct

title: ${featureContainerResource} not found
cause: ${featureContainerResource} with ID ${resourceId} was not found
action: Please check if requested ID ${resourceId} is correct

title: Extended ${featureContainerResource} not found
cause: Extended ${featureContainerResource} with ID ${resourceId} was not found
action: Please check if requested ID ${resourceId} is correct

title: ${resource} not found
cause: No ${resource} was found for ID ${resourceId}
action: Please check if requested ID ${resourceId} is correct

title: ${featureContainerResource} is not active
cause: The method is not allowed, because the resource ${resourceId} is not active.

title: ${featureContainerResource} is marked as read-only
cause: The method is not allowed, because the resource ${resourceId} is marked as read-only.
action: Update the resource definition to enable editing of features.

title: Error parsing request body
cause: ${cause}
action: Please, check if the request body is valid

title: The job configuration could not be compiled
cause: ${cause}
action: Please, provide a correct job configuration

title: The job configuration is invalid
cause: ${cause}
action: Please, provide a correct job configuration

title: No inputs can be created after a job was submitted.
cause: The job's execution has already started, so no inputs can be added anymore.
action: If the job has been started accidentally, cancel the job and create a new one with all inputs prior starting it.

title: Wrong input type. No inputs other than "${allowedType}"s can be created for non-pipeline jobs.
cause: An input of wrong type was provided to the job.
action: Please, use a correct input type

title: No inputs can be created for a pipeline job before it is running.
cause: An input was provided to the pipeline job, but it is not started yet.
action: Please, start the pipeline job before trying to provide inputs to it

title: The maximum size of an input for a pipeline job is 256KB.
cause: An input was provided to the pipeline job, that was exceeding the maximum size.
action: Please, provide an input that is not larger than 256KB

title: Inputs of job "${referencedJob}" can not be referenced by job "${referencingJob}" as it has a different owner.
cause: Illegal access. The job that was tried to be referenced is belonging to a different owner.
action: Please, upload different inputs to this job

title: The requested job does not exist
cause: No job with ID ${jobId} exists.
action: Please, check whether the correct job ID was provided in the request

title: Payload type "${jsonType}" is not supported.
cause: A JSON object with type "${jsonType}" was provided, but an object of type "${expectedType}" was expected in the request payload.
action: Please, provide a JSON object with the correct type: "${expectedType}"
